I'm not so sure about that. I guess I'm just speaking in RK Saitou's 
case =
since during the height of RK Fandom, everyone thought it was 
so cool that=
 he was a married and a dad. This can be seen via the 
sites that stress th=
is point eventhough RK itself never showed his 
personal life or family lif=
e. I myself, touted that when I fangirl 
over the guy even if I'm more of a=
n alt pair fan than anything else. 

Although we can take Kondou's role in =
anime... He's quite the nice 
old man in PMK. I don't recall if they even m=
entioned he was a dad 
and was married (probably not). But in that case it =
this statement 
might apply, it certainly applies to the doujinshi antholog=
ies 
involving him that I've come across... But not in NHK. Certainly I 
lo=
ve his portrayal there especially with his family life. 

So I think it's a=
 case by case basis. Just IMHO tho.

~Kizu
